text: (gentle music)
(Katja speaks German)
(Kai speaks German)

- The operations cluster leader
for AWS here in Deutschland,
in Frankfurt.
(Nina speaks German)

- Public sector partner
team by AWS in Berlin.
- We have here many different cultures.

- At AWS, there are lots of
people from around the world.

- Everyone is valued and
everyone is appreciated.

- And I think when you
have diverse backgrounds
is when you get richer opinions.

- What's unique or
probably peculiar about AWS

is that everybody cares
about your personal growth
and your career growth.

- Definitely, AWS gives
you a lot of opportunities
to learn and to grow.

- Especially after university,
it's very important

to be in a place where you
have the support needed
for your own career development.

- I've learned many things,
not just about tech,
also about how to work with other people

and just support each other
and to work as one team.
- And the best part of working at AWS

is you have all this
opportunity that you can take on

and everyone is helping
you and guiding you.

- [Maria] I say work life
balance is quite flexible.
It really depends on you.

- While a lot of people
can work from home,
when we come to the office,
it's always good to see so many people.

- And AWS really trusts
in you being a person
that can make their own decisions,

so if I need to go to
a doctor's appointment

in the middle of the
day, that's totally fine.
- AWS is still a big company,
but it feels more like a startup.
(inspirational music)

- There's always room to
actually build new initiatives.
You're always heard.

I think the leadership
is very approachable.

- I really like innovating
and discovering new things.
I get to think about a new problem

and try to find a solution
that hasn't been done before.
- If you have the love for hardware,

if you have the love to
learn about new things
and interact with a very smart team,
I can guarantee you will get the support
from your team in AWS

and you will be challenged
to grow every day.
(inspirational music)
- Every day is exciting.
(gentle music)
